author: senh
title: Last flight of US Airways evokes 'golden age' of air travel
text: BING NEWS: Last flight of US Airways evokes 'golden age' of air travel (CNN)It's the end of the line for US Airways. The airline that started as a tiny airmail service 76 years ago is retiring as part of a 2013 merger with American Airlines. The final US Airways flight is scheduled to take off from Philadelphia on Friday. BING SEARCH: Talking about the new American Airlines logo | Webdesigner ...
